contentrichtext.text: [[Image:Rw-map.png|frame|right|250px|Map of Rwanda]] This is a [[list of cities]] in [[Rwanda]]: *[[Butare]] *[[Byumba]] *[[Cyangugu, Rwanda|Cyangugu]] *[[Gisenyi]] *[[Gitarama, Rwanda|Gitarama]] *[[Kibeho]] *[[Kibungo Municipality|Kibungo]] *[[Kibuye]] *[[Kigali]] *[[Nyanza, Rwanda|Nyanza]] *[[Ruhengeri]] *[[Rwamagana]] *[[Gikongoro]] *[[Gasarenda]] {{Africa in topic|List of cities in}} {{Rwanda topics}} [[Category:Lists of cities by country|Rwanda, List of cities in]] [[Category:Populated places in Rwanda| ]] [[Category:Lists of cities in Africa|Rwanda]] [[Category:Rwanda geography-related lists|Cities]] {{rwanda-geo-stub}}
